description._content: Returns the comments for a photoset.

response._content:
<comments photoset_id="109722179">
    <comment id="6065-109722179-72057594077818641"

         permalink="http://www.flickr.com/photos/straup/109722179/#comment72057594077818641"
         >Umm, I'm not sure, can I get back to you on that one?</comment>
</comments>

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: photoset_id
argument._content: The id of the photoset to fetch comments for.
